thread.title: Jamie O’Hara CONFIRMS romance with Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney after split from Bianca Gascoigne – and reveals he has introduced her to his kids
thread.title_full: Jamie O’Hara CONFIRMS romance with Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney after split from Bianca Gascoigne – and reveals he has introduced her to his kids

author: bpotter
title: Jamie O’Hara CONFIRMS romance with Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney after split from Bianca Gascoigne – and reveals he has introduced her to his kids
text:
3 Jamie O’Hara has confirmed his romance with Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney 
His latest romance comes after he split from Bianca Gascoigne despite falling for the model in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
Just days after finishing the Channel 5 show he was back in the arms of Elizabeth who he dated last year. 
Speaking at the Philip Christopher Baldwin LGBT history month dinner in association with Gay Times, he said: “She was my ex that I split up with a while ago. She’s an amazing girl. I went out with her for a period of time after I left Danielle. 
“Things didn’t work out for us but I always held her in a high degree cause she was such a nice person.” Getty Images Elizabeth-Jayne and Jamie attend London Fashion Week two days ago WENN Gay rights activist Philip Christopher Baldwin with Jamie at the event to celebrate LGBT history month last night 
The pair are now believed to be dating—and his three boys are big fans of her. 
“Coming out of the show, we saw each other on a night out and we started chatting again and I looked at her as if to say maybe there’s something there for us. 
“She’s met my boys and they love her. That’s the first thing my son said to me after I Facetimed him out of the show ‘where’s Liz?’. She knows my children and my children love her.” Jamie O'Hara pushes his personal trainer in a lake Related stories NO CHANCE OF BEING BFFS Danielle Lloyd insists she can 'never be friends' with ex Jamie O'Hara again DATE NIGHT CBB BFFs Calum Best and Jamie O'Hara share the love for each other as they enjoy a dinner for two cat that got the cream Beaming Jamie O'Hara drives ex-girlfriend Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney home - in clearest sign yet that they're back together ROMANCE REIGNITED? Jamie O'Hara shares romantic pic with ex Elizabeth-Jayne appearing to confirm they are back on AWKWARD RUN-IN? Bianca Gascoigne's exes Jamie O'Hara AND CJ Meeks risk awkward run-in at LFW show 
The latest revelations come after Danielle told Closer magazine she could never be “friends with Jamie again” but insisted to remain civil for the sake of their children. (link) 
Speaking to Closer magazine , she said: “Jamie and I will remain civil for the children. We have the boys together but we definitely can’t be friends.” 
She also spoke about her boyfriend Michael O’Neil, who she calls her “soul mate”. 
She added: “I’m now in the relationship I was meant to be in and I’ve never been happier. 
“He helps me out so much with the children and he’s my soul mate. We can’t wait for the next chapter.”
